item.title: All current Item Definitions
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:14, topic:297584”]ps formatting is awful actionscript had errors intially and i couldnt find the the bit i needed
EDIT: got it working
was in fact reading the wrong child (mybad)

_root.groundItemModel = this.childNodes[1].firstChild.nodeValue;

EDIT2:

[code]stop();
function loadXML(loaded) {

if (loaded) {

_root.name = this.firstChild.childNodes[1].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.groundItemModel = this.firstChild.childNodes[0].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelZoom = this.firstChild.childNodes[2].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelRotation1 = this.firstChild.childNodes[3].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelRotation2 = this.firstChild.childNodes[4].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelOffset1 = this.firstChild.childNodes[5].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelOffset2 = this.firstChild.childNodes[6].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.Members = this.firstChild.childNodes[7].firstChild.nodeValue;

name_txt.text = _root.name;
model_txt.text = _root.groundItemModel;
mz_txt.text = _root.ModelZoom;
mr1_txt.text = _root.ModelRotation1;
mr2_txt.text = _root.ModelRotation2;
mo1_txt.text = _root.ModelOffset1;
mo2_txt.text = _root.ModelOffset2;
mem_txt.text = _root.Members;
} else {
trace(“file not loaded!”);

}

}
xmlData = new XML();
xmlData.ignoreWhite = true;
xmlData.onLoad = loadXML;
xmlData.load(“items/0/output.xml”);
[/code]
its fully functional now i’ve just got to apply it for each item and then fint a suitable way of letting people view it, also examine info in another dump would be nice I’ve left out comments but if you wnat comments in it just lemme know and i’ll add some to explain whats going on[/quote]

examine info is rather impossible anymore, its sent in a in-game packet now.

Read full topic

item.title: All current Item Definitions
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

ps formatting is awful actionscript had errors intially and i couldnt find the the bit i needed
EDIT: got it working
was in fact reading the wrong child (mybad)

_root.groundItemModel = this.childNodes[1].firstChild.nodeValue;

EDIT2:

[code]stop();
function loadXML(loaded) {

if (loaded) {

_root.name = this.firstChild.childNodes[1].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.groundItemModel = this.firstChild.childNodes[0].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelZoom = this.firstChild.childNodes[2].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelRotation1 = this.firstChild.childNodes[3].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelRotation2 = this.firstChild.childNodes[4].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelOffset1 = this.firstChild.childNodes[5].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.ModelOffset2 = this.firstChild.childNodes[6].firstChild.nodeValue;
_root.Members = this.firstChild.childNodes[7].firstChild.nodeValue;

name_txt.text = _root.name;
model_txt.text = _root.groundItemModel;
mz_txt.text = _root.ModelZoom;
mr1_txt.text = _root.ModelRotation1;
mr2_txt.text = _root.ModelRotation2;
mo1_txt.text = _root.ModelOffset1;
mo2_txt.text = _root.ModelOffset2;
mem_txt.text = _root.Members;
} else {
trace(“file not loaded!”);

}

}
xmlData = new XML();
xmlData.ignoreWhite = true;
xmlData.onLoad = loadXML;
xmlData.load(“items/0/output.xml”);
[/code]
its fully functional now i’ve just got to apply it for each item and then fint a suitable way of letting people view it, also examine info in another dump would be nice I’ve left out comments but if you wnat comments in it just lemme know and i’ll add some to explain whats going on

item.title: All current Item Definitions
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

What this includes, Itemdefs as XML and itemdefs in binary format (317 - 377)

XML Example:

  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> 
- <item>
  <groundItemModel opcode="1">12307</groundItemModel> 
  <name opcode="2">Bagged evergreen</name> 
  <modelZoom opcode="4">919</modelZoom> 
  <modelRotation1 opcode="5">249</modelRotation1> 
  <modelOffset2 opcode="8">-100</modelOffset2> 
  <price opcode="12">-657063936</price> 
  <members opcode="16">true</members> 
  <certID opcode="97">15240</certID> 
  </item>

Whats is a opcode:

int i = stream.readUnsignedByte();

    private void readValues(Stream stream) {
        do {
            int i = stream.readUnsignedByte();
            if (i == 0) {
                return;
            }
            if (i == 1)
                modelID = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 2) {
                name = stream.readString();

            } else if (i == 3)
                description = stream.readBytes();
            else if (i == 4)
                modelZoom = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 5)
                modelRotation1 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 6)
                modelRotation2 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 7) {
                modelOffset1 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                if (modelOffset1 > 32767)
                    modelOffset1 -= 0x10000;
            } else if (i == 8) {
                modelOffset2 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                if (modelOffset2 > 32767)
                    modelOffset2 -= 0x10000;
            } else if (i == 10)
                stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 11)
                stackable = true;
            else if (i == 12)
                value = stream.readDWord();
            else if (i == 16)
                membersObject = true;
            else if (i == 23) {
                anInt165 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                aByte205 = stream.readSignedByte();
            } else if (i == 24)
                anInt188 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 25) {
                anInt200 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                aByte154 = stream.readSignedByte();
            } else if (i == 26)
                anInt164 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i >= 30 && i < 35) {
                if (groundActions == null)
                    groundActions = new String[5];
                groundActions[i - 30] = stream.readString();
                if (groundActions[i - 30].equalsIgnoreCase("hidden"))
                    groundActions[i - 30] = null;
            } else if (i >= 35 && i < 40) {
                if (actions == null)
                    actions = new String[5];
                actions[i - 35] = stream.readString();
            } else if (i == 40) {
                int j = stream.readUnsignedByte();
                modifiedModelColors = new int[j];
                originalModelColors = new int[j];
                for (int k = 0; k < j; k++) {
                    modifiedModelColors[k] = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                    originalModelColors[k] = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                }

            } else if (i == 78)
                anInt185 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 79)
                anInt162 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 90)
                anInt175 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 91)
                anInt197 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 92)
                anInt166 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 93)
                anInt173 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 95)
                modelScale = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 97)
                certID = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 98)
                certTemplateID = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i >= 100 && i < 110) {
                if (stackIDs == null) {
                    stackIDs = new int[10];
                    stackAmounts = new int[10];
                }
                stackIDs[i - 100] = stream.readUnsignedWord();
                stackAmounts[i - 100] = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            } else if (i == 110)
                anInt167 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 111)
                anInt192 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 112)
                anInt191 = stream.readUnsignedWord();
            else if (i == 113)
                anInt196 = stream.readSignedByte();
            else if (i == 114)
                anInt184 = stream.readSignedByte() * 5;
            else if (i == 115)
                team = stream.readUnsignedByte();

        } while (true);
    }

http://silabsoft.org/items.zip

Read full topic
